author: brane
msg: C++HL Infrastructure: Add C++ wrappers for APR pools, arrays and hash tables.
* build.conf (private-includes): Add C++HL private header files.
(libsvncxxhl): Include sources from the aprwrap subdirectory.
Includes all the APR wrapper API headers.

author: brane
msg: C++HL Infrastructure: Insert an InternalError base class
(Error): Derive from InternalError instead of std::exception.
